name: Etris
description:
Remix of Tetris that adds a couple new pieces, and 2 more columns

Originally, I had an HTML clone of tetris that I poked around with but this was made from the bottom up.

KEYBOARD:
W/Up - Rotate piece
S/Down - Move piece down
A/Left - Move piece Left
D/Right - Move piece Right
Space - Drop piece
Esc - Pause/Unpause

CONTROLLER:
Joystick: Move piece
Directional Buttons: Move piece
Options: Pause/Unpause
Square/Circle: Rotate piece left and right
Cross: Drop piece
L/R: Rotate piece left and right
